devdoc.author: Nikita S. Buzov

buyCoverage(uint256,uint256).details: This function call must be made with an ETH payment in the amount of `coveragePrice`% / year

params._coverAmount: Amount of ETH to be covered by the plan (in units of Wei)
params._coverPeriod: Period for which the coverage plan is active (in units of seconds)

returns._0: true / false based on success of the function call

deposit().details: This function call should be made with an ETH payment in any amount, no parameters

returns._0: the QSR balance of the account

getReward().details: In this version the rewards distribution doesn't seem to work, though the function calls are successful

openClaim(string).details: This function call simply sends a message to the contract owner and creates and open claim

params.statement: Message to the contract owner with a statement

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.coverageID: The coverage ID number of the claim to be resolved by the contract owner

params._coveragePrice: The coverage price as percentage of ETH amount covered for 365 days

toggleContractActive().details: Contract owner can turn off all ETH and QSR capital flows from/to this contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: If you would like to withdraw all the funds, then just call exit() function

params.amount: Amount of ETH to be withdrawn (in units of Wei)

devdoc.title: Quasar: capital pool that facilitates mutual-like risk sharing

buyCoverage(uint256,uint256).notice: Purchase coverage for specified ETH amount and time period

totalSupply().notice: View the total supply of ETH deposited into this contract

userdoc.notice: This contract lets liquidity (coverage) providers to         deposit funds and earn fees + native token rewards,         while users can buy coverage against the pool
